message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair share while also considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob, compensating for the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
Given the inflation, I suggest an equal division of the $10,000 to ensure both parties receive a fair share, considering the diminishing value of money in each round.
